name: Low
description:
Low is a Side Scroller/Action-Adventure game with unique items, 3-way upgrade system and different difficulty levels. The game also includes Insane (mortal) mode. You must find the source of the red curse by wandering through the darkest atmospheres in the dark world.

IN-GAME FEATURES
Basically you will fight against enemies with old school 8 direction aiming method, duble jumping, rolling and Bullet Rain skill. As you progress through the game, you'll also get some active and passive skills, effective unique items and different weapons. There is 6 chapter in the game which completely dark and surreal atmospheres. Enemies and mighty bosses who fell into the dark world before you and turned into the slave soldiers will do everything to stop you.
